home.title: Morocco Exchange Rates
home.subtitle: Track real-time currency exchange rates from the Moroccan Central Bank, commercial banks, and exchange offices across Morocco.

currencyRates.title: Currency Rates
currencyRates.content: View the latest official exchange rates published by the Moroccan Central Bank with historical charts and trends.

bankRates.title: Bank Rates
bankRates.content: Compare exchange rates offered by different commercial banks in Morocco to find the best rates for your transactions.

exchangeOffices.title: Exchange Offices
exchangeOffices.description: Find the best rates near you
exchangeOffices.content: Discover exchange offices across Morocco and compare their rates to get the most value for your money.

registerSection.title: Are you an exchange office?
registerSection.content: Register to list your exchange office and update your rates in real-time to attract more customers.

currencies.title: Currency Exchange Rates
currencies.subtitle: Official exchange rates from Bank Al-Maghrib (Moroccan Central Bank). Updated daily at 12:00 PM Moroccan time.

aboutRates.title: About These Rates
aboutRates.paragraph1: The exchange rates displayed on this page are the official rates published by Bank Al-Maghrib (BAM), the central bank of Morocco. These rates are used as a reference for financial institutions and commercial transactions.
aboutRates.paragraph2: Please note that commercial banks and exchange offices may offer different rates for their services. The actual rate you receive may vary depending on the institution, transaction amount, and other factors.
aboutRates.clickInfo: Click on any currency card to view its historical chart.

banks.title: Moroccan Banks
banks.subtitle: Compare exchange rates offered by different commercial banks in Morocco. Click on a bank to view their current rates.

exchangeOfficesPage.title: Exchange Offices
exchangeOfficesPage.subtitle: Find the best exchange rates from offices across Morocco

login.title: Login
login.subtitle: Enter your credentials to access your account

signup.title: Create an account
signup.subtitle: Register your exchange office to display your rates
